alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Brevard County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 12:27AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1227 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mims, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Haulover Canal, Mims, Playalinda Beach and Scottsmoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Brevard County
